name: conglomeration
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large group or mass of different things all collected together in an untidy or unusual way: There was a strange conglomeration of objects on the mantelpiece.

Add to word list
a large group or mass of different things gathered together: The dish is a wonderful conglomeration of sausage, chicken, seafood, and rice.
